name: Main Event: Wrestling Manager
storyline: Your starting steps in the industry will determine almost every step on your journey. Coming from a business background means more money to spend on events and workers, whereas a disciplined wrestling background may result in harder, more loyal workers. Will people want to work with you for your money, or to gain your respect? These are all questions you'll have to ask yourself when it comes to building your promotion.
summary: Main Event: Wrestling Manager is a wrestling booking simulator where you will hire and develop talent and staff, book matches, handle logistics and the media and much more in order to build your promotion into the best wrestling empire that has ever existed.
